00031 /** 
00032  *  @defgroup ro_stabilizer  Stabilization control
00033  *  @code #include <stabilizer.h> @endcode
00034  * 
00035  *  @brief Controller code for stabilizing the platform
00036  *
00037  * 
00038  * This file contains the controller algorithm for stabilizing
00039  * the platform by calculating the current position of the device
00040  * and setting the PWM-Signals of the motors accordingly, so the
00041  * platform is in balance.  
00042  *  
00043  *  @note Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006
00044  *  @author Original C167 code by segway team, adaption to AVR by Rainer Ostendorf
00045  */
00046 
00047 
00048 #ifndef STABILIZER_H_
00049 #define STABILIZER_H_
00050 
00051 /** PI ... */
00052 #define PI 3.14
00053 
00054 /** the initial value, the gyroscope 1 measures, when not beeing moved */ 
00055 #define GYRO1_ZERO_VALUE -65.0
00056 
00057 /** scaling factor to calculate the angular speed (omega) from
00058  * the Gyroscope1 value 
00059  * 
00060  * from orignal code :
00061  *   OMEGA   = ( ( (GYRO-GYRO_zero) / 2048) * 2 * PI * 300) / 360;
00062  * <=> OMEGA = ( (GYRO-GYRO_zero) * 0.920388) / 360 
00063  * <=> OMEGA = ( (GYRO-GYRO_zero) * 2.556634E-3
00064  *  
00065  * TODO: Needs to be adapted to sensor 
00066  */
00067 #define GYRO_TO_OMEGA_FACTOR 0.002556634
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071 /** correction factor for scaling the acclerometer value to degrees */
00072 #define ACCL_TO_DEGREE_FACTOR 25.0 /* from original code: (0.04)^-1 */
00073 
00074 
00075 /** zero point of the steering potentiometer. 
00076  * (10Bit resolution -> 1024 max, so 1024/2)
00077  * */
00078 #define STEERING_ZERO_POINT 512   
00079 
00080 /* responsivness of the steering */
00081 #define STEERING_RESPONSIVENESS 0.001
00082 
00083 /** tilt angle factor for kalman algorithm
00084  * TODO: add detailed description here!
00085  * This is not documented in original code */
00086 #define K_ANGLE 5.0
00087 
00088 /** angular speed (omega) factor for kalman algorithm
00089  * TODO: add detailed description here!
00090  * This is not documented in original code */
00091 #define K_OMEGA 0.16666
00092 
00093 /** correction factor for kalman algorithm
00094  * TODO: add detailed description here!
00095  * This is not documented in original code */
00096 #define K_CORR_FACTOR 1.0
00097 
00098 /** setpoint (sollwert) of the controlling algorithm 
00099  * TODO: Check comment! Add detailed desciption */
00100 #define SET_POINT 0.0
00101 
00102 /** factor to scale the set value with for current speed 
00103  * TODO: Check comment! Add detailed desciption */
00104 #define CUR_SPEED_FACTOR 4.0
00105 
00106 void stabilizer_loop( void );
00107 
00108 
00109 #endif /*STABILIZER_H_*/
